code:
%% Mindmap: Feature brainstorm for a project management tool
%% The root node is the product; branches are feature areas
%% Leaf nodes are specific feature ideas

mindmap
    root((Project Manager))
        Task Management
            Create and assign tasks
            Due dates and reminders
            Subtask checklists
            Drag-and-drop priority
        Collaboration
            Real-time comments
            @mentions and notifications
            File attachments
            Activity feed
        Reporting
            Burndown charts
            Velocity tracking
            Export to PDF
        Integrations
            Slack notifications
            GitHub issue sync
            Calendar sync
